thread.title: Helping High-Net-Worth Clients Navigate the Challenges of Their Wealth

author: wsjcom
title: Helping High-Net-Worth Clients Navigate the Challenges of Their Wealth
text:
Sandi Bragar • Managing director in planning strategy and research, principal at Aspiriant, San Francisco • Education: B.A., University of California, Santa Barbara • Professional designations: Certified Public Accountant, Certified Financial Planner
Background: Ms. Bragar discovered financial planning as a career path in college and was drawn to the field. Growing up, her dad was an entrepreneur, and she witnessed the ups and downs of life with a variable income. “Things were either really flush and exciting—or they...
